mapper.sql: id, tag_name, device_tag, description, unit, range_min, range_max, total_flag, main_tag, note, [disable], class_id, energy_type_id, signal_type_id, system_id, meter_id, [location], create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT A.id, tag_name, company_id, plant_id, building_id, device_id, meter_id, A.energy_type_id, energy_type_name, A.signal_type_id, signal_type_name, A.system_id, system_name, A.class_id, class_name, total_flag, main_tag, description, [disable], A.create_by, A.create_time, A.update_by, A.update_time FROM S2_Variable A JOIN O_5Meter B ON A.meter_id = B.id JOIN O_4Device C ON B.device_id = C.id JOIN O_3Building D ON C.building_id = D.id JOIN O_2Plant E ON D.plant_id = E.id LEFT JOIN S_Class F ON A.class_id = F.class_id LEFT JOIN S_EnergyType G ON A.energy_type_id = G.energy_type_id LEFT JOIN S_SignalType H ON A.signal_type_id = H.signal_type_id LEFT JOIN S_System I ON A.system_id = I.system_id where A.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete:
delete from S2_Variable where id in
#{id}
